wrapTextArray

public static java.lang.String[] wrapTextArray(java.lang.String s,
                                               int len)
Takes a long String and breaks it down into an array of separate Strings of maximum "len" length. Useful for preparing text for display on screen.

Parameters:
s - String to be wrapped
len - Maximum character length of each line
Returns:
Array of String objects containing the wrapped text.
